titles.title: Requesting the President to transmit to the House of Representatives not later than 14 days after the date of adoption of this resolution documents in the possession of the President relating to the receipt and consideration by the Executive Office of the President of any information concerning the variation between the version of S. 1932, the Deficit Reduction Act of 2005, that the House of Representatives passed on February 1, 2006, and the version of the bill that the President signed on February 8, 2006.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported Unfavorably by the Yeas and Nays: 15 - 13.

action.text: Reported adversely by the Committee on Government Reform. H. Rept. 109-457.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 172.

bill.summary: 5/9/2006--Reported to House without amendment. Requests the President to transmit to the House of Representatives, within 14 days after the adoption of this resolution, all documents, including telephone and electronic mail records, logs and calendars, and records of internal discussions in his possession relating to the receipt and consideration by the Executive Office of the President of any information concerning the variation between the version of S. 1932, the Deficit Reduction Act of 2005, that the House passed on February 1, 2006, and the version of the bill that the President signed on February 8, 2006.
